content: आवृत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Covered, screened, concealed. {@--2@} Invested, blocked. {@--3@} Enclosed, surrounded (by a ditch, wall &c.). {@--4@} Spread, overspread, overcast; आवृते नभस्तले <ls>H. 3.</ls> {@--5@} Filled or abounding with. --तः A man of mixed origin, the son of a Brāhmaṇa by a woman of the Ugra caste; <ls>Ms. 10. 15.</ls>
